TopicTitle: What will you do first in 1.0?

Articles.Content:
We are getting closer and closer to 1.0, and I'm beyond excited. What is everyone looking forward to doing the most/first?

I'm thrilled about finally starting a career save that I can never have to worry about needing to restart because of a major change in development. It will be much more interesting being in career mode now that (hopefully) the alt+f12 menu will be gone, since I couldn't help but use it at times, and I'll definitely be placing more importance on the lives and safety of my Kerbalnauts.

So yeah, what about all of you?

I'll definitely start up a career campaign, so I can give my final verdict on the game. I've got big problems with career at the moment. I'm interested to see what Squad deems worthy of a 1.0 release.
